(Having a good time...)

Boats at 1.0.5 are great so.... someone should work on jet ski, for sure.

And I found that I can jump this vehicle (followed by diving into water) so I tried backflip but always shattered into pieces...

So maybe you are skilled for extereme sports and could try that with your own vehicle and it'll be cool if succeeded.

Hope to see something spectacular. :cool:
